system.description:
A spell to create a sphere of darkness centered on the casterâ€™s head or focus. The darkness is mobile and will move with the caster.

The spell creates total darkness only where there is already poor illumination. In full daylight, the spell only creates a slight gloom. The intensity increases with CS.

The radius of the sphere is CSI hexes. The caster is able to see perfectly in the darkness. This spell can be used to neutralize an equivalent light-producing spell.

 

Bonus Effects

CML60+The sphere may be fixed in space, allowing the caster to move outside its radius.
CML80+The sphere may be rooted on a subject within CSI hexes. The subject is affected by the darkness/gloom.

 

Time: 35-CSI seconds

Range: Self/CSI hexes at CML80+

Duration: CSI minutes
